prompts: Show me a powerful steel-type Pokemon designed to resemble a dinosaur with heavy armor.
Imagine a robust Pokemon that has a metallic appearance and can withstand heavy attacks.
Create a Pokemon with a rocky texture and a fierce expression, perfect for defense.
Generate a large, quadruped Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience in battle.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature into a massive armored beast.
Give me a Pokemon that looks intimidating and can intimidate its opponents with its size.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing its powerful legs and claws.
